      • PartitionThreadEntity

        public PartitionThreadEntity(String name,
                             int totalListCount,
                             int eachSize,
                             int batchNumber,
                             int currentListSize)
        Instantiates a new group thread entity.
        Parameters:
        name - 线程的名字
        totalListCount - 总数,list 的总size
        eachSize - 分配大小
        batchNumber - 批次,当前线程序号,从0开始
        currentListSize - 当前线程执行数量,=perBatchList size
